name: Humario: Shade's Oasis
description:
Humario Shade's Oasis is a Mobile 2D side-scrolling Platformer. It follows "Shade" after someone mysteriously sends him to the graveyard, he must find his way back to the protected oasis. He will need the help of "Mr. Goo" and a lot of luck to avoid "The Four Horseman". He will encounter Wraith's, Minotaur's, Troll's, Golem's, and Knight's.

 Humario is a game that I have been working on for around three years. It is a dream project that I have been planning on making ever since I started learning game design and programming. 

18 Unique enemies, 10 Different Levels. How fast can you finish?
